name: IColumnsBlockData
description: Block data model for ColumnsBlock. Defines the layout and style properties for a multi-column block, including children (cells), column widths, gaps, and per-cell styling.

name: IButtonBlockData
description: Block data model for ButtonBlock. Describes all properties for rendering and styling a button in the PageBuilder, including action type, label, link, color states, font, spacing, and border options.

name: IDividerBlockData
description: Block data model for DividerBlock. Defines all properties for rendering and styling a horizontal divider line in the PageBuilder, including size, color, spacing, and alignment.

name: IHeadingBlockData
description: Block data model for HeadingBlock. Defines the content and style properties for a heading (h1–h6) block, including rich text, heading level, color, font, spacing, and alignment.

name: ITextBlockData
description: Block data model for TextBlock. Defines the content and style properties for a rich text block, including HTML content, font styles, spacing, and alignment.

name: IImageBlockData
description: Block data model for ImageBlock. Defines all properties needed to render and style an image within the PageBuilder, including source, alt text, caption, sizing, alignment, and fit/position options.

name: ISlideImage
description: Slide image data model for HeroSliderBlock (and similar components). Defines the properties for each slide's image, including source, accessibility, action/linking, and image display options.

name: IHeroContent
description: Represents a styled textual content block within a HeroSlider slide (e.g. hero header or hero text). Used for slide-level headers and body text with customizable typography and spacing. Each instance can define its own selector and styles for CSS serialization and live preview. All style props are optional, with live editing and export supported.

name: ICallToAction
description: Represents a Call-to-Action (CTA) button or link within a HeroSlider slide. Used for slide-level action buttons with custom labels, links, and alignment. Each CTA supports its own CSS selector and inline styles for export/live preview. All style props are optional and extensible for future releases.

name: IHeroSlide
description: Data model for a single slide in the HeroSliderBlock. Describes all visual and content properties of a slider slide—including image, overlay, hero header/text, and call-to-action (CTA).

name: IHeroSliderBlockData
description: Block data model for HeroSliderBlock. Defines all properties for configuring a hero image slider, including slides, controls, autoplay, looping, indicators, and styling.

name: IVideoBlockData
description: Block data model for VideoBlock. Defines the source URL and padding for embedding a video within the PageBuilder.

name: SocialType
description: Supported social platform types for the Socials/Sharing block. Extend this type to add new platforms as needed.

name: ISocialIconConfig
description: Data model for a single social icon link. Defines the platform, user link, accessible label, and optional color for a social media icon in the PageBuilder.

name: ISocialsBlockData
description: Block data model for SocialsBlock (social/sharing icons). Defines which social icons to render, their visual style, alignment, and spacing.

name: IHtmlBlockData
description: Block data model for HtmlBlock. Stores the raw HTML string and padding for a custom HTML block in the PageBuilder.

name: ContentBlockType
description: Content block type union. Supported values include "heading", "text", "button", "divider", "columns", "image", "hero_slider", "video", "socials", "html", and custom string values.

name: ContentBlockData
description: Union type representing the serializable payload for any content block. Used for persisting page content, serialization/deserialization, and conversion to HTML or other formats for preview/export.

name: IContentBlock
description: Represents a single content block instance within the PageBuilder. Stores both the block’s data/content and any associated UI/preview or style metadata.

name: IColumnsBlock
description: Extends IContentBlock for columns layout. Adds children (as a 2D array of content blocks) and optional columnWidths for flexible layouts.

name: IDesignBlock
description: Shared interface for identifying and referencing a DOM-rendered <div> block. Used to track a specific content block via its unique ID and DOM reference, assisting with scroll positioning, selection, and placement during drag-and-drop or formatting operations.

name: IDesignBlockProps
description: Defines the props required to render and interact with a single draggable and editable block within the PageBuilder's canvas. Used in both DesignCanvas and ColumnCell contexts. Supports reordering, deletion, drag state, and live editing state.

name: DesignBlock
description: DesignBlock is a reusable layout wrapper used to visually and structurally wrap individual content blocks (e.g., HeadingBlock, TextBlock) inside the DesignCanvas. Enables block-level interactions (deletion, border highlighting, drag-and-drop, etc.). Each DesignBlock manages its own DOM ref, visual state transitions, and optionally supports editing and drag styling.
code_example:
<DesignBlock
    designBlockId="abc123"
    designBlockRef={ref}
    onDelete={() => removeBlock("abc123")}
    isEditing={true}
    onDragStart={(id) => console.log("drag started", id)}
  >
    <TextBlock ... />
  </DesignBlock>

name: columns-serialization
description: Serialization and deserialization utility functions for ColumnsBlock. Includes helpers for serializing, deserializing, and transforming column block data for storage, export, and preview.
